recipesJson.name: Citraspberry Soda
recipesJson.author: staybert
recipesJson.description:
A fresh citrus raspberry soda for y'alls!

Thanks to @EdibleMalfunction and @humanpuck from the DYI_eJuice discord, who took time to mix this up and also helped me find the missing pieces in this recipie.

Notes:
**FLV Citrus Soda & CAP Lemon Lime** acts as the soda base. I'm not sure if I'm imagining but I feel that the citrus/sprite taste gives you somewhat of a fizzy feeling. It's also just enough % so that it gives a good contrasting flavor to the berries, without overtaking them.
**INW Raspberry:** At 0.75% this flavor is amazing, just enough to get that bold sweet raspberry flavor, without becoming floral.
**FLV Boysenberry:** Just a touch of this fantastic flavor is enough to give the raspberry more body and a sweet syrup-y taste that you expect a soda to have.
**TFA Dragonfruit:** This works as the emulsifier, bledning all these flavors together to a unified soda.
**INW Cactus** adds some wetness and complexity to the whole mix, it also helps tone down the bright citrus notes a bit. The first days you might feel a slight taste of it (not bad imo), but it will be much less over time.
**WS-23** is optional, but I like my sodas COLD! Personally I use this at 1%, but I put a lower percentage so that it doesn't catch anyone by surprise, as it can be quite overwhelming if you are not used to it.

reviews.text: Delicious berry soda. Smooth and not harsh whatsoever. Perfectly balanced with the berries and the lemon-lime combo.
awesome juice, great selection of flavors and balanced.  I didnt mind the ws23 at .5 percent but I may lower it just a quarter or blend polar with it. Thanks for sharing this one!!!

Beautifully balanced mix of berry and citrus. This has easily become my new adv. I get a lovely taste of those refreshers candy bars with the sherbet in the middle. Has a very authentic soda feel on the exhale. Well done Bertie, cracking recipe!
This is just gosh darn delightful. Perfectly balanced blend of delicious berries and citrus, this makes a very challenging flavor profile seem easy. Mix it, you wonâ€™t regret it.

This is really tasty recipe.  You might want to knock the WS-23 down if you're not a lunatic like Bert.  I mixed this up without the cap lemon lime and it was still an absolutely banging summary vape.  The cactus is just enough to make the juicy and the %'s on the Rasp and Boysenberry are pretty much perfect.  I love how he got so much flavor out a low total flavoring %, well done.
